headline: Trump hosting fundraiser for Republican lawmakers at Mar-a-Lago estate
author: Brandon Gage
sentences: Invitees include Trump-endorsed challengers to incumbents who voted to impeach and convict Trump for inciting the January 6th, 2021 insurrection at the United States Capitol as well as individuals hoping to unseat Trump foes that serve on the House Select Committee investigating the attack.

The "Take Back Congress Candidate Forum" will be littered with 10 congressional Trump acolytes like Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio and 13 hopefuls such as United States Senate candidate Herschel Walker of Georgia.
super political action committee will host a major fundraiser for Republican lawmakers and candidates for public office at his Palm Beach, Florida Mar-a-Lago estate on Wednesday.
The event is the brainchild of Florida's Republican Attorney General Pam Bondi, who along with Trump's eldest son Donald Jr. will be there, an unnamed source told NBC.
